name: Metal Car Solid
description:
Watch out to your Fuel! Be cautious to the guards! Find the opened container!

/!\ Due to a lack of time, I couldn't do properly the sound design, so for the moment there is only one ambient sound /!\

Controls (for both Keyboard and Gamepad, Xbox One Controller here):

  • Forward/Reverse: W/S, Z/S & RT/LT
  • Brakes: S or LT while moving with the vehicle
  • Steering (Left/Right): A/D, Q/D & Left Stick
  • Restarting in case you have no more fuel/beaten by the guards: R & A button

Fonts used:

  • OBRAZEC (Cover title) by Ilya Zakharov: https://fontesk.com/obrazec-2-0-font/
  • "ANTON" from Unity textmesh pro collections (used in game)

Pre-made assets used:

  • "SHADED: FREE Retro Car" by Mena: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/shaded-free-retro-car-179...
  • "Low-Poly Retro City Car 03" by Zeus Game Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/low-poly-retro-city-car-0...
  • "RPG/FPS Game Assets for PC/Mobile (Industrial Set v1.0)" by Dmitrii Kutsenko: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/industrial/rpg-fps-game-as...

Sound used:

  • GS amb warehouse storage QUAD  from the free brank sounds gdc of Sonniss, here the latest free one => https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc2020/
